title: CANT UPDATE DUE TO RANDOM ERROR?????FIX??
body: everytime i attempt to update it will be at 33% updated then an error always accurs i have uninstalled and reinstalled league of legends completely and all together please fast feed back is better thank you!

replies.body: At this point in the process, the patcher needs to connect to the patching servers and download files.  Something seems to be blocking your network from doing that, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help fix things up.  Reinstalling wouldn't really fix network issues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
thank you for your time however it still isnt working if you have anymore ideas please throw them my way again thank you for responding

Happy to help, thought it's a bummer to hear those steps didn't work out.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out some more.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to acquire some logs and attach it to the ticket.  This will give us more context, and we'll reply back asap!

I have got that too.
I tried deleting the RADS folder and that helped and it started patching but when it's almost done applying, I get an "unspecified error"
